name: Blocky Fox Craft Simulator 3D
description:
Become a fox in Blocky Fox Craft Simulator 3D.

Live the life of the animal in blocky world. Craft, fight and complete quests. Find an animal mate and breed a new blocky fox. Develop a survival strategy against wild and farm animals. Level­up a fox in simulator to improve craft and survival skills. Or find other blocky foxes and start a family. Farm next levels to open new survival skills in the animal simulator.

Features of Blocky Fox Craft Simulator 3D:

- Big blocky world
- Craft instructions
- Many survival locations
- Animal behaviour simulator
- Blocky fox family
- Survival and quests mode
- Craft system
- Many animal species

Have your own blocky animal, that you can feed, ride and craft with! Choose simulator's mode that you like more - animal survival or quests. The both are enjoyable. Start your survival and craft right now, with our fox simulator. We like foxes and do our best to make great animal games. Create your craft strategy in the simulator. Blocky fox in the simulator is better than real animal! Be a good blocky fox, or evil fox - it is up to you.

Have you ever dreamed to be a fox? In our survival simulator we offer you to craft for the blocky animal. Become a fox and run across blocky locations! Maintain your fox health, survival in the blocky world is not easy for animal. Sneak into a farm. Fight for survival with every animal you meet and craft. Your blocky fox can even die in the simulator. Craft things to upgrade your animal. Finish all quests - in the blocky survival simulator they can be challenging, but funny.

Blocky Fox Craft survival Simulator 3D has special animal sounds. Run and listen, deep into craft and survival. This survival simulator has a map and a guide inside. Simulator controls allow you to run, fight and of course craft. Read how to ride your animal and many other things. You will meet a lot of animal species in the survival simulator.
Craft like an animal. Survival games are so great!

Try our Blocky Fox Craft survival Simulator 3D, be a fox and explore a big beautiful world!
